text: This list of theatrical animated feature films consists of animated films produced or released by Lionsgate. Lionsgate releases films from Lionsgate- owned and non-Lionsgate owned animation studios. Most films listed below are from Splash Entertainment which distributed animated films for Lionsgate, producing its first feature-length animated film Norm of the North in 2016. Lionsgate has also released animated films by other production companies, such as Aardman Animations. ==Films== ===Released=== {| class="wikitable" style="float:right;" |+ Color legend |- |Splash Entertainment | style="background:#00bfff; " | |- |Other Lionsgate studio | style="background:gray; " | |- |Third-party studio | style="background:white; " | |} {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |+ |- style="color:black" ! scope="col" style="width:300px;"|Title ! scope="col" style="width:275px;"|Original theatrical release dateListed are the original theatrical release dates in the United States (or other non-U.S. territories) when the film was contributed by Lionsgate.
